Description:
Detects adversary creating screen capture of a desktop with Import Tool.
Highly recommended using rule on servers, due to high usage of screenshot utilities on user workstations.
ImageMagick must be installed.


Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Screen Capture with Import Tool
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where ((type = 'execve' and a0 = 'import') and ((a1 = '-window' and a2 = 'root' and (a3 like '%.png' or a3 like '%.jpg' or a3 like '%.jpeg')) or (a1 like '%.png' or a1 like '%.jpg' or a1 like '%.jpeg')))
